code: /*----- Importaciones y dependencias -----*/import{createContext}from'react';import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const AppContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();/*----- Context Provider -----*/export const AppContextProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[auth,setAuth]=useState(null);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const[logged,setLogged]=useState(false);const[userData,setUserData]=useState({});const[commonHost,setCommonHost]=useState("https://blue22feather.pythonanywhere.com");/*window.location.host  <-- para cuando el servidor este montado --> http://localhost:5000*/const[localCounter,setLocalCounter]=useState(0);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppContext.Provider,{value:{localCounter,userData,auth,isLoading,logged,setAuth,setIsLoading,setLogged,setUserData,commonHost,setCommonHost,setLocalCounter},children:children});};
